attributes.action: Remove Damian Collins MP for failing to represent his constituents.
attributes.additional_details: Residents of Stanford & surrounding villages formed a campaign group, SOS Kent with over 2,000 members to stop the monstrous £250m unprecedented 4000 space lorry park and offered up options for smarter solutions gaining support from Eurotunnel, Port of Dover, CPRE & shipping company, Motis agreeing one massive lorry park will not solve Operation Stack.The Transport Select Committee report said it had been rushed & government "has not demonstrated clearly enough what options have been evaluated".
attributes.background: Damian Collins has not replied to 100's of letters sent around Dec 2015 from residents of Stanford & surrounding villages re: the proposed £250m lorry park, bringing dangerous pollution levels to villages. During this period he has written a book & has been heavily promoting it on Facebook/Twitter.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs because of the way in which they handle their constituency duties.
